alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 2:06PM MST until November 03 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, mixing with rain at times below 7000 feet early Thursday morning. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, with higher amounts above 8000 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber-Overgaard, Shonto and Williams. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Doney Park 1 to 2 inches Flagstaff 1 to 3 inches Forest Lakes 2 to 4 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 2 inches Shonto 1 to 2 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
